text: 15.2: Mk 7.5 naŋga, Lu 11.38Mumɨndɨhi nandɨ sɨmbɨrasara nɨŋɨnɨŋ arɨŋandɨ añɨŋgitakɨñandu tɨkatɨka kuyu arɨŋ ŋgumu nɨŋɨnɨŋ mɨŋata kavarandu. Ñɨrɨm, kuma ñɨmburɨtara mañandu, vamu.15.2 Sɨmbɨrasara haŋɨnɨŋɨndu kuma haŋɨnɨŋ ñɨŋɨndɨmbanzɨkwɨ mandɨhira ñamu. Ñɨŋɨ naŋga hɨmɨnda Gotɨndu tamɨŋgañɨ mɨŋata, nurɨŋambi ñɨŋɨ naŋgandɨtuma vata Juda hati pɨŋitundu. Kamataharɨm kuyu tɨkatɨka mu, kuma ñɨmburɨta Gotɨndu tamɨŋgañɨ sɨhinda ñaŋɨrandɨtara ñañandu ŋandi kɨndi.
